News.title: Immigration and visa news
News.subtitle: Short and practical updates on South African immigration rules, processing times and global visa changes.

0.title: South African visa processing times change
0.summary: Recent updates from the Department of Home Affairs indicate varying timelines for work, study and family visas. We explain what this means for new applicants.

1.title: Clarification on South African student visas
1.summary: Universities have published new guidance on study permit documentation and timelines for international students arriving for 2025 semesters.

2.title: Updates on tourist and training visas abroad
2.summary: New information on tourist and short-term training visas for the USA, Canada, Europe and the UK, including appointment availability and documentation tips.
